page.title: 10Schools
page.content:
In Kilbride there are not a lot of schools as it is a country area. One of the schools still standing is the {Kilbride}Primary School.
Kilbride{Primary }School is still providing{education}to teach children. It's headmistress is Mrs Jo Connor. There are two{teachers}as well as Jo Connor and they are called Mrs McCorriston and Mrs Whincup.
This year the Primary Seven's who sat the Eleven Plus in Kilbride added up to six pupils.
Ballybracken School was built in nineteen hundred and four but it has closed down now.
